actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the special rule for contributions of book inventory to public schools.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend through 2011 the enhanced tax deduction for charitable contributions of book inventory to public schools.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to extend the special rule for contributions of book inventory to public schools.
